page.title: 05WOODBERRY BROS. AND HAINES
page.content: WOODBERRY BROTHERS AND HAINES IS THE LARGEST EMPLOYER IN HIGHBRIDGE WITH SOME 550 EMPLOYEES. THE COMPANY WAS STARTED TO MAKE SCHOOL FURNITURE IN THE SCHOOL BUILDINGS ERA OF THE 1950'S. NOW THE PRODUCTS ARE PACKAGED DINING ROOM AND BEDROOM FURNITURE. THIS IS SOLD THROUGHOUT THE UNITED KINGDOM AND OVERSEAS. IT IS AN EXPANDING COMPANY AND RECENTLY PREMISES OF AN ADJOINING GLASS FACTORY AND A BUS GARAGE HAVE BEEN PURCHASED. THIS ENABLES EXPANSION OF PRODUCTION AND FACILITIES FOR SERVICE OF THE GROWING FLEET OF LORRIES MANUFACTURING PROCESSES HAVE BEEN ORGANISED INTO A CONTINUOUS FLOW SYSTEM USING MODERN MACHINERY, SOME BEING COMPUTER CONTROLLED. THE COMPANY SELLS ITS FURNITURE TO NATIONALLY KNOWN FURNITURE SUPPLIERS.
